Detailed Description

Class for doing probe set quantification using median as does MEDIAN.

Member Function Documentation

void QuantMedian::computeEstimate (  )  [virtual]

Compute the median.

Compute median.

If PM-MM is zero threshold at a small positive number to avoid taking logs of numbers that aren't positive.

Implements QuantMethod.
